attributes.action: Renovate our war memorials as the best way of marking the Centenary of the First World War 2014 - 2018
attributes.additional_details: Interest in - and plans for - this major milestone in our history are starting to take shape. With living memory of the conflict now gone, our war memorials are the only tangible link we have with those dark years of slaughter. With many of these fine structures suffering the ravages of time, does just one in every 650 people in Britain believe that there could be no better way of honouring those who gave everything than by renovating those memorials which need it? That's all it takes....but check out www.clean2018.moonfruit.com if you need convincing.
